name: my first racing game - no ads
name_original: my first racing game - no ads
description:
Available languages: 34 languages ​​and dialects

Albanian, English, Basque, Catalan, Croatian, Danish, Spanish, Estonian, French, Finnish, Galician, Welsh, Hungarian, Indonesian, Irish, Icelandic, Italian, Latvian, Lithuanian, Malay, Dutch, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Slovenian, Slovak, Swedish, Tagalog, Czech, Turkish, Finnish, Maltese.

Please note that this application is made especially for toddlers. The maximum recommended age is 6 years, the recommended minimum age is 18 months. We encourage you to stay with your child to play with him.

This game is evolving. Depending on the options enabled the game will adapt to the age of your child. For the youngest just a click on the screen so that the car moves along the path. For older children it is possible to control the vehicles with a virtual joystick.

This game allows young children to have a racing game that corresponds to their abilities. The graphics look like games for older children but the gameplay is appropriate to their ability.

3 game modes are available:

- The mode "discovery" where the child just run quietly in the levels to discover them.
- The mode "picks gifts" where the child has to collect gifts scattered around the level to win the race.
- The mode "single stroke" where the child faces an opponent in a race.

Features:

- 8 different vehicles available
- 9 levels available
- Qualities Graphics adapted for children
- 3 different game modes
- Controls dynamically evolving to accommodate young children
- Gameplay suitable for children
- Sounds and music suitable for children
- Version without advertising
